attributes.name: Privilege Escalation via Windir Environment Variable v100.0.1
attributes.description: Identifies a privilege escalation attempt via a rogue Windows directory (Windir) environment variable. This is a known primitive that is often combined with other vulnerabilities to elevate privileges.
author: Elastic

subtechnique.name: Path Interception by PATH Environment Variable

attributes.query:
registry where registry.path : ("HKEY_USERS\\*\\Environment\\windir", "HKEY_USERS\\*\\Environment\\systemroot") and
 not registry.data.strings : ("C:\\windows", "%SystemRoot%")
